mapper.select: select pc.comm_no AS commNo, pc.project_no AS projectNo, pc.emp_code AS empCode, e.emp_name AS empName, r.rank_name AS rankName, t.team_name AS teamName, pc.comm_content AS commContent, pc.file_name AS fileName, pc.file_path AS folePath, pc.comm_date AS commDate from tbl_project_comm pc join tbl_emp e on pc.emp_code = e.emp_code join tbl_rank r on e.rank_code = r.rank_code join tbl_team t on e.team_code = t.team_code order by pc.comm_date desc
